name: Ninja Strike
description:
Description

Ninja Strike is a local multiplayer platformer game where you verse the other player to gain the most amount of points. Collect ninja throwing stars and defeat monsters on the way. The player with the most points at the end of the games wins. Ninja Strike is based in three different parts of the world, New York city, Japan and a forest. This is a fun and challenging short game that is fun to play with friends. The style of this game is cartoony with fun colours that suit the fun vibe of the game.   

Key Features

  • Travel through three different levels that are based on three different locations. New York city, Japan and a forest, while versing another player.
  • Run, jump and throw knives at monsters to get to the end while collecting throwing stars.

Contact

johannadons@gmail.com

Personal Bio

I am a student at Media Design School in Auckland studying Bachelor of Creative Technologies. Making a game was one of the first assignments I had to do. This game is my very first game I have ever made and it has given me many more ideas for future games that I would like to make in the future.
